messages.content: Tell me about the solar system.

The solar system consists of the Sun and everything that orbits around it, including eight planets (Mercury, Venus, Earth, Mars, Jupiter, Saturn, Uranus, and Neptune), dwarf planets like Pluto, dozens of moons, and millions of asteroids, comets, and meteoroids. The Sun contains 99.86% of the mass in the solar system and provides the energy that sustains life on Earth.
